pullrequest.title: Reset joint positions after harnessing (all except the torso joints)

content.raw: Actually, a list of things that are cause for a valid gazebo reset would be nice.  The inability to reset the ihmc state estimator should also count, I think, as Val can't take any steps when the pose estimate is maybe more than 30cm lower than the previous one.
content.html: Actually, a list of things that are cause for a valid gazebo reset would be nice. The inability to reset the ihmc state estimator should also count, I think, as Val can't take any steps when the pose estimate is maybe more than 30cm lower than the previous one.
